Posts.EditableText:
I was referred here by a game I found at another site that uses Quest.  Unfortunately, it appears to be very out of date.  When I try to do some things, I get syntax errors in the debug window.  I tried loading it in QDK, and it said that the game was made for a version of Quest before version 3.0, and that I can't edit it with QDK for that reason.

Is there some place where I can download an older version of Quest to run this thing?
Posts.HTML:
I was referred here by a game I found at another site that uses Quest. Unfortunately, it appears to be very out of date. When I try to do some things, I get syntax errors in the debug window. I tried loading it in QDK, and it said that the game was made for a version of Quest before version 3.0, and that I can't edit it with QDK for that reason.

Is there some place where I can download an older version of Quest to run this thing?

Posts.EditableText: Quest is designed to be fully backwards-compatible with older games, so they [i:it6x7z34]should[/i:it6x7z34] run without problems. If you could please send me the broken ASL file (or tell me where to download it) I can take a look into why this happening.
Posts.HTML: Quest is designed to be fully backwards-compatible with older games, so they should run without problems. If you could please send me the broken ASL file (or tell me where to download it) I can take a look into why this happening.
